  • fieldwire

Modern technologies

Hardware:

Drone
  • Drones can be used to conduct site surveys, fly around with high resolution cameras to see how their building looks. Definitely better than workers standing at the ground looking straight up at the building.
  • Can monitor progress during construction.
  • Costs: $350-500
3D Printer
  • Construct buildings with faster efficiency, productivity
  • It doesn't print mixture fast enough, it will be harden before being used
  • Less manpower needed
  • Cost: $180k - 1M

Software:

FieldWire
  • App is free
  • Have website and mobile version
  • App can be used offline
  • Can be used to create blueprint
  • Able to estimate cost, manpower needed
Plangrid
  • App is free
  • Able to share blueprint, notes, drawing
  • Can access data online and offline
  • Mainly used for information management

Brainstormed invention

  • Function: Simulation
    • Can create blueprint based on conditions given and spot
    • List pros and con
    • estimate average cost, material needs
    • Facilities needs checklist
